vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.info: Potatoes are tuberous crops and a staple food in many countries.

vegetables.name: Tomato
vegetables.info: Tomatoes are widely used in cooking and are a good source of vitamins A and C.

flowers.info: Roses are popular ornamental flowers, known for their beauty and fragrance.

flowers.name: Marigold
